text: A robot is a great way to communicate business information to your potential clients. Once a user messages you, the robot can give then options about further information, for example a class schedule at a Yoga studio or more information on a teacher.  Further, a user can opt-in for more target information, for example a city could have robot notify users of upcoming local events.  Many of the concepts of email marketing can be tranferred to a robot but with a much more personalized and interactive experience.
